import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { selectCount } from "../userSlice"; import { selectLoggedInUser } from "../../auth/authSlice"; import { fetchUserOrdersAsync } from "../userSlice"; import { selectOrdersOfUser } from "../userSlice"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function UserOrders() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const user = useSelector(selectLoggedInUser); const orders = useSelector(selectOrdersOfUser); useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchUserOrdersAsync(user.id)); }, [dispatch,user.id]); return (
{orders.map((order) => (
